titlestmt.titleproper: Plan para el establecimiento de una negociación mercantil para con sus productos atender al pago de la guarnición que guarnece la Peninsula de California y al fomento de la mismo 1825

did.head: Collection Summary
did.unittitle: Plan para el establecimiento de una negociación mercantil para con sus productos atender al pago de la guarnición que guarnece la Peninsula de California y al fomento de la mismo 1825

origination.label: Creator
origination.corpname: Mexico. Junta de Fomento de Californias.

did.abstract: Eight-page manuscript copy of original document in secretarial hand, dated February 10, 1825, and signed by Francisco de Paulo Tamariz. This plan arranged for the establishment of a mercantile negotiation, for products to take care of payment of the garrison that provides for the Peninsula of California, and encourage the same.

prefercite.head: Credit Line
prefercite.p: Plan para el establecimiento de una negociación mercantil para con sus productos atender al pago de la guarnición que guarnece la Peninsula de California y al fomento de la mismo (MS 173). Special Collections, University of Arizona Libraries.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: The Junta de Fomento de Californias was established to colonize California, and establish Monterey as a commerical capital to dominate Pacific trade.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Eight-page manuscript copy of original document in secretarial hand, dated February 10, 1825, and signed by Francisco de Paulo Tamariz. This plan arranged for the establishment of a mercantile negotiation, for products to take care of payment of the garrison that provides for the Peninsula of California, and encourage the same. Accompanied by a six-page statement of transmittal, also signed by Tamariz, on June 21, 1825.

This plan was adopted along with others in 1825 by the Junta. Some of the plans were published, in 1827, under the title: Colección de los principales trabajos en que se ha ocupado la Junta nombrada para meditar y proponer al supremo gobierno los medios mas necessarios para promover el progreso de la cultura y civilización de los territorios de la Alta y de la Baja California.
